alert.note: Alert for Green; Lafayette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 7:08AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Lafayette and Green Counties through 745 AM CDT... At 707 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Apple River, or near Darlington, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Brodhead, Darlington, New Glarus, Shullsburg, Monticello, Albany, Argyle, Apple River, Wiota, South Wayne, Fayette, Lamont, Browntown, Gratiot, Attica, Calamine, Juda, Jordan Center, and Yellowstone Lake St Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
